river.name: Plaitedcosmos the Prime Bread of Quakes
Vulgarstorm the Constructive Thorns of Wallowing

artifact.item_description: i am alethareci, the watchful morsels, once of the underworld. by esmin the eagle of savagery, i bind myself to this place.

written_content.title: Only The Night Weeps In The Beginning
Only The Wind Will Tell Afterward
Horns: The Wind Will Tell There
